name: Dig & Dug
description:
Dive into the world of underground tunnels and test your skills as a mole in this exciting sidescroller game! Created during the Global Game Jam 2023, where the theme was "Roots", this game takes you on an endless journey as you dig your way through the dirt, dodging roots and collecting precious potatoes along the way. Put your reflexes to the test and see how far you can go in this fast-paced and challenging adventure.
Credits:
Lars Werthmann, David Root, Tina Mertinaschk, Rabea Klein, Nisa Yalcinkaya, Andy Emmerich, Dylan Weber, Tobias Knauf
